0.1.name: wordpress/getfirefox
0.1.description:
This plugin helps to spread one of the greatest browser we have yet, by displaying a get firefox button in the sidebar of your blog or anywhere else.

Languages included are english and german so far. If you like to translate this plugin to including the images to a third language, please contact me. Thank you!

You can place the badge via the old and the new wordpress widget interface. If your theme is not widdget ready, you can place this <?php if(function_exists('get_firefox'))get_firefox(); ?> codesnippet anywhere in your template file to display the firefox download button.
